data.text:
This hotel is located a little away from the busiest tourist area but still a short walk to most places we wanted to visit. 
The rooms are a bit small by American standards but clean and adequate. The staff was the MOST helpful finding restaurants, giving us suggestions/ information. Etc…. The breakfast each morning had a wonderful selection that was very tasty. The rooftop bar (pool area) had a lovely view and served a very good light dinner the night we arrived and were jet-lagged. We were too tired to walk anywhere…
I would highly recommend staying here!
data.title: Great hotel with extremely helpful staff

data.text: I would highly recommend this hotel for a stay in Barcelona. Great location, smart, professional, friendly staff and a very comfortable room. Got an email the day before arriving following up on my request for a balcony offering an upgrade to make sure we did get a balcony as the hotel was full over the Easter weekend. Yes it cost a bit more and yes it was an upsell but it meant someone was reviewing incoming guest ahead of arrival which is to be applauded. We accepted and were able to check in on arrival despite being a few hours ahead of regular check in. Little gift and a hand written welcome note were delivered later in the day. Excellent breakfast and although the hotel was full, there were no queues and everything felt relaxed. Only minor thing that could e improved would be the temperature of the hot breakfast offering. No one loves cold fried eggs.
data.title: Smart, friendly, comfortable hotel in an excellent location.

data.text: Fantastic hotel! Everywhere was clean, the breakfasts great - but to top it all, the staff were brilliant! Very helpful & polite at all times. Definitely recommend this hotel!  Our room was kept clean, as was the bathroom. Great breakfast choice too.
data.title: Great Barcelona Hotel!

user_location.name: West Bromwich, Sandwell, West Midlands, England

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear CliffPa,
Thank you for choosing our H10 Casanova Hotel for your most recent stay in Barcelona, also for leaving us such a wonderful review.
We are very glad to read that you enjoyed your accommodations, as well as the highly personal service that we extend to our clients.
We really look forward to welcoming you again soon.
Best regards,
owner_response.author: David Torres

data.text:
Nice little hotel in a great location in Central Barcelona. Clean tidy, good for us that the staff spoke good English and were welcoming. 

It's situated very close to the a1 bus to and from the airport, and right near the gothic quarter and LGBTQ+ area, so lots of great little cafes, bars and restaurants.

While it's on a main road, the double double doors for the balcony hide all the noise, maybe a little noise from the hallway occasionally, but as the hotel is small this was infrequent.

Rooftop bar is a nice spot and the breakfast was good.
data.title: Mid March weekend break

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Joe P,
We thank you for choosing our H10 Casanova Hotel for your visit in Barcelona, and also for your time and comments that are essential for the constant improvement of our hotel as we strive daily to give you the best attention and services.
We really look forward to welcoming you again soon.
Best regards,
owner_response.author: David Torres

data.text:
Visited for 3 nights & was delighted to arrive at 12pm to find our room was ready so we could check in straight away.
We got the aerobus from the airport to the hotel, which had a stop very close by! 
Our room was a great size, very clean & you could not fault it! Bed was comfy and no noise from the road. 
Location of hotel is perfect, breakfast had so much choice & staff were so friendly! And I enjoyed having a glass of cava with my breakfast! 
We were able to leave our luggage on the day of the departure and the hotel ordered a taxi for our return to the airport.  
Would definitely recommend this hotel & this is the best we have stayed at for a city break! Simply could not fault anything!
data.title: Fantastic hotel!
